class Solution:

    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        g = [[] for _ in range(n)]
        for i in range(n - 1):
            g[i].append([i + 1, 1])
        arr = [i for i in range(n)]
        ans = []
        for u, v in queries:
            iu = bisect.bisect_right(arr, u)
            iv = bisect.bisect_left(arr, v)
            # arr = arr[0:iu] + arr[iv:]
            del arr[iu: iv]
            ans.append(len(arr) - 1)
        return ans
